com.example.webook

类 DataBaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.webook.DataBaseManager

  • public class DataBaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class keeps functions handle database operation Or handling information get from database

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addBook(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, Book book, Owner owner)
      This add a book document in database
      void authenticate(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String pwd, MainActivity mainActivity)
      This check for username and password consistency in database If consist and login success, jump to homepage for users with different usertype
      void BookProfileAddUserSnapShotListener(OwnerBookProfile ownerBookProfile, java.lang.String isbn)
      This method sets a SnapshotListener, when user update the info of a book, it will call updateBookInfo method
      void BorrowerHomepageBookAddSnapShotListener(BorrowerHomepage borrowerHomepage, java.lang.String username)
      This method sets a SnapshotListener on the BorrowerHomepage

      This method sets a SnapshotListener on BorrowerHomepage.
      void BorrowerProfileAddUserSnapShotListener(BorrowerProfileActivity borrowerProfileActivity, java.lang.String username)
      This method sets a SnapShotListener, when the info of borrower changes, it will call updateBorrowerInfo method
      void BorrowerRequestPageRequestSnapShotListener(BorrowerRequestPageActivity borrowerRequestPageActivity, java.lang.String username)
      This method set a SnapShotListener, if there is any change of the borrower's requests in the database, the array list will refresh
      void BorrowerSearchBook(java.lang.String message, BorrowerSearchBookPage borrowerSearchBookPage)
      This search books by keyword in multiple fields in database
      void BorrowerSearchUser(java.lang.String message, BorrowerSearchUserPage borrowerSearchUserPage)
      This search user by username in database
      void borrowerSignUp(java.lang.String usernameText, java.lang.String emailText, java.lang.String phoneText, java.lang.String pwdText, java.lang.String descriptionText, SignUpActivity signUpActivity)
      This check if document with same name exist in database If not, it add a document into user with usertype borrower in database
      void declinePressed(java.lang.String isbn, SameBookRequestList sameBookRequest)
      This show the updated request list for a book in the database
      void deleteBook(OwnerBookProfile ownerBookProfile, java.lang.String isbn)
      This method is used to delete a book, after the action it will show a toast to inform owner the deletion is successful or failed
      void deleteImage(java.lang.String isbn)
      This method is used to delete the image of a book
      void getSameBookRequest(java.lang.String isbn, SameBookRequestList sameBookRequest)
      This search for requests in the database which request for a book and show the list
      void getUserBorrowBookProfile(BorrowerBookProfile borrowerBookProfile, java.lang.String username)
      This method allows users to tap the name of owner or borrower in BorrowerBookProfile to see their profile

      This method allows users to tap the name of owner or borrower in BorrowerRequestDelivery to see their profile

      This method allows users to tap the name of owner or borrower in OwnerAcceptDeclineFragment to see their profile

      This method allows users to tap the name of owner or borrower in OnwerBookProfile to see their profile

      This method allows users to tap the name of owner or borrower in OwnerReturn to see their profile

      This method allows users to tap the name of owner or borrower in Request Profile to see their profile

      This method allows users to tap the name of owner or borrower in ShowBookDetail to see their profile

      This method set a SnapShotListener, when owner add new books, the book list of owner homepage will refresh

      This method set a SnapShotListener on an owner, if there is any change, the owner home page will refresh

      This method sets a SnapshotListener, when the info of owner changes, it will call updateOwnerInfo method

      This method set a SnapShotListener on, if there is any change of the owner's requests in the database, the array list will refresh

      • authenticate

        public void authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String pwd,
                         MainActivity mainActivity)
        This check for username and password consistency in database If consist and login success, jump to homepage for users with different usertype
        参数:
        username -
        pwd - These are username and password you want to check

      • BorrowerSearchBook

        public void BorrowerSearchBook(java.lang.String message,
                               BorrowerSearchBookPage borrowerSearchBookPage)
        This search books by keyword in multiple fields in database
        参数:
        message -
        borrowerSearchBookPage - These are the keyword you want to search and the page you want to show the data

                               BorrowerSearchUserPage borrowerSearchUserPage)
        This search user by username in database
        参数:
        message -
        borrowerSearchUserPage - These are the username you want to search and the page you want to show the data

        public void addBook(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                    Book book,
                    Owner owner)
        This add a book document in database
        参数:
        bitmap -
        book -
        owner - These are the picture, book item and owner information that you want to add into the document

        public void sendBookRequest(Request newRequest,
                            Borrower borrower)
        This send a bookRequest into database
        参数:
        newRequest -
        borrower - These are request infomation and the user who send this request

        参数:
        username -
        phoneText -
        emailText -
        descriptionText - These are new field values you want your document to have

      • getSameBookRequest

        public void getSameBookRequest(java.lang.String isbn,
                               SameBookRequestList sameBookRequest)
        This search for requests in the database which request for a book and show the list
        参数:
        isbn -
        sameBookRequest - These are the isbn code the requested book had and the page you want to show the list

        public void BorrowerHomepageRequestListener(BorrowerHomepage borrowerHomepage,
                                            java.lang.String username)
        This method sets a SnapshotListener on BorrowerHomepage. When there is any change relate to the borrower, it will refresh the list and also show a toast to inform the borrower what had been changed
        参数:
        borrowerHomepage -
        username - These are related activity and the username
